content: one of the best parts of an afternoon tobogganing or shoveling snow happens afterward when you come in from the chilly outdoor air to curl up in front of a warm fire a hot cup of cocoa or scotch in hand and admire the snow falling onto the evergreens outside that cozy experience is the inspiration for the motif on this hat i hope is makes you feel cozy too **finished sizing ** hat will be approximately 25 4 cm/ 10 inches tall and will fit a womens/unisex teens 51cm-58cm/20 - 22 inch head **needles ** 1 us size 6 4 00 mm 24 circular needle 4 or 5 us size 6 4 00 mm double pointed needles *or sizes needed to obtain gauge **notions ** 6 stitch markers one in a contrasting colour to denote the beginning of round 1 tapestry needle to weave in ends **gauge ** 21 stitches and 22 rounds = 4 inches thank-you to boabdil and herzleid for generously translating this pattern it is now available in both english german and swedish downloads
